mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NUM AS "contentId", REPLY_BOARD_NUM AS "boardId", REPLY_COMMENT AS "content", REPLY_WRITER AS "Writer", REPLY_REG_DATATIME AS "reg_date", RNUM AS "seq" FROM ( SELECT REPLY_NUM, REPLY_BOARD_NUM, REPLY_COMMENT, REPLY_WRITER, REPLY_REG_DATATIME, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT * FROM REPLY WHERE REPLY_BOARD_NUM=#{boardId} ORDER BY REPLY_NUM ASC ) ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY (REPLY_NUM, REPLY_BOARD_NUM, REPLY_COMMENT, REPLY_WRITER, REPLY_REG_DATATIME) VALUES (#{contentId},#{boardId},#{content},#{writer},SYSDATE)
